beamy adjective
(SMILE)
A beamy smile shows joy or happiness: "Guess what I found out today!" she said with a bright, beamy smile. Everyone at the table was looking at me with a beamy grin, waiting for me to open the envelope.

beamy adjective
(ROOF)
A beamy roof or building has beams (= long thick pieces of wood that support the roof) that are not hidden: The villa had beautiful terracotta floors and beamy ceilings.

(BOAT)
